revised_title: Observations of Animals and a Strange Plant in the Kingdom of Congo
tldr: The authors describe their observations of various animals and a strange plant during their voyage to the Kingdom of Congo. They discuss the 'Poux de Pharaon,' a small insect that infests the feet, and large serpents that can swallow whole sheep. They also mention the destructive nature of ants in Angola and the unique 'Niceffo' fruit tree with only two leaves.
